title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect behavior in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 regarding custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299 - The servlet specification in chapter 7.1.1 states that a custom cookie name affects URL rewriting, but this behavior is not observed in the current trunk.
OB: The observed behavior is that the default "jsessionid" is used for URL rewriting instead of the custom cookie name.
EB: The expected behavior is that if the specification is followed, the Reload link should be http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
SR: "That is not true for the current trunk: the default "jsessionid" is used instead. I am attaching a war file that reproduces this issue. Steps to reproduce: 1. Deploy the war file as cookiename.war. 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/.
